text: Carol Ann Blackman (born 14 October 1947) is a Bermudian equestrian. She competed in the individual eventing at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Bermudian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Bermuda Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Bermuda Category:Equestrians at the 1991 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Carol Ann Blackman
